name: Fear - Friendly Extraterrestrial Assembly Robot
description:
~ Story ~
Whole worlds are cracking and falling apart.
Who you gonna call to reconnect the pieces?
There's only one robot for this dirty job.
It's your Friendly Extraterrestrial Assembly Robot!
His friends call him Fear.

~ Instructions ~
Move with WASD or arrows, use turbo with Spacebar
Reassemble the shattered pieces of the worlds, don't let them fly off (only happens in HC)
Avoid black holes and don't let "her" troll you
Toggle minimap with M and get a hint with H
Quit to level select with Esc

Created within 72h for Ludum Dare 30. (Theme: Connected worlds)
